    PenaltyFunctions.ElasticNetPenalty — Type.

    ElasticNetPenalty, weighted average of L1Penalty and L2Penalty

    g(θ) = α * abs(θ) + (1 - α) * .5 * θ ^ 2

    PenaltyFunctions.ElementPenalty — Type.

    Penalties that are applied element-wise.

    PenaltyFunctions.GroupLassoPenalty — Type.

    Group Lasso Penalty. Able to set the entire vector (group) to 0.

    PenaltyFunctions.IntervalSet
    PenaltyFunctions.L1Penalty — Type.

    L1Penalty aka LASSO

    g(θ) = abs(θ)

    PenaltyFunctions.L2Penalty — Type.

    L2Penalty aka Ridge

    g(θ) = .5 * θ ^ 2

    PenaltyFunctions.LearnBase
    PenaltyFunctions.Learnable
    PenaltyFunctions.LogPenalty — Type.

    LogPenalty(η)

    g(θ) = log(1 + η * θ)

    PenaltyFunctions.Loss
    PenaltyFunctions.MCPPenalty — Type.

    MCPPenalty(γ) (MC+)

    PenaltyFunctions.MahalanobisPenalty — Type.
    MahalanobisPenalty(C)

    Supports a Mahalanobis distance penalty (xᵀCᵀCx for a vector x).

    PenaltyFunctions.NoPenalty — Type.

    Unpenalized

    g(θ) = 0
